item.description:
How would you like to fly through the air like a bird?

Allan Lim found this link to discount tickets to trapeze lessons!

http://www.livingsocial.com/deals/506044

 

Here is their trapeze web site.

http://boston.trapezeschool.com/

 

If a small number of people are interested in going and get the coupons, we'll go as an unofficial group. If a lot of people are interested in going, I can reserve a group package for us, but we probably can't combine the coupons with the group reservation.

The maximum class size is 10 per session.

 

If there are more than 10 people, we will create a second event to accomodate.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Learn Trapeze! (buy discount ticket before Nov 5)
